thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Raul G
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Raul G

author: Raul G
title: Raul G
text: I'll start off by saying I wasent sure if this was a legitimate website, mostly because I had never heard of it before. I got a couple bundles to see if it worked, and after a few mins of figuring out I had to use the steam codes on my desktop I was delighted. One of my new favorite sites to get games at.
